name: Togepi Dress Up Game
description:
One of 2 of my 2nd ever game. I learned how buttons work along with a few other things, allowing me to make a dress up game. I like Pokémon, one of the Pokémon I like is Togepi, and I find it sad that most Pokémon dress up games dress up the trainers rather than the Pokémon themselves. Click on the arrows to pick out the outfits for Togepi to wear.

The version you are playing here is so that it can be played on mobile devices.  Go to here if you want an unshrunk version.

Game made by MiniDragonfly (deviantart.com/minidragonfly)
